description: Explore the fundamental laws of nature.

applications.name: Single Spring Oscillation
applications.description: Drag and release a mass on a spring to see harmonic motion.

applications.name: Projectile Motion
applications.description: Set launch angle and velocity; visualize projectile trajectory.

applications.name: Free Fall & Gravity
applications.description: Drop an object from different heights; display fall time and impact velocity.

applications.name: 2 Body Gravity Simulation
applications.description: Two masses orbiting each other under gravity.

applications.name: Pendulum Swing
applications.description: Change string length and mass; visualize pendulum oscillations.

applications.name: Wave on a String
applications.description: Animate sine waves traveling on a string; adjust amplitude and frequency.

applications.name: Collision Simulator (Elastic)
applications.description: Simulate two balls colliding elastically; control masses and velocities.

applications.name: Inclined Plane Motion
applications.description: Block slides down an incline; adjust angle and friction Block slides down an incline; adjust angle and friction Block slides down an incline; adjust angle and friction Block slides down an incline; adjust angle and friction Block slides down an incline; adjust angle and friction Block slides down an incline; adjust angle and friction Block slides down an incline; adjust angle and friction Block slides down an incline; adjust angle and friction Block slides down an incline; adjust angle and friction Block slides down an incline; adjust angle and friction

description: Dive into the world of molecules and reactions.

applications.name: Interactive Periodic Table
applications.description: Block slides down an incline; adjust angle and friction Block slides down an incline; adjust angle and friction Block slides down an incline; adjust angle and friction Block slides down an incline; adjust angle and friction Block slides down an incline; adjust angle and friction Block slides down an incline; adjust angle and friction Block slides down an incline; adjust angle and friction Block slides down an incline; adjust angle and friction Block slides down an incline; adjust angle and friction Block slides down an incline; adjust angle and friction

applications.name: Molecule Builder
applications.description: Drag and connect atoms to create molecules like water or CO2.

applications.name: pH Scale Slider
applications.description: Slide through pH values to see acid/base color changes and info.

applications.name: States of Matter Animation
applications.description: Visualize particles in solid, liquid, and gas states.

applications.name: Element Quiz
applications.description: Quiz to match element symbols to their names.

applications.name: Reaction Simulator
applications.description: Mix chemicals and observe simulated reactions with color and gas effects.

applications.name: Acid-Base Titration Curve
applications.description: Simulate pH changes during titration and identify endpoints.

description: Master concepts from numbers to geometry and probability.

applications.name: Graph Plotter
applications.description: Enter functions and see live plotted graphs.

applications.name: Number Line Game
applications.description: Drag numbers to their correct positions on the number line.

applications.name: Shape Builder
applications.description: Draw basic shapes and calculate their area and perimeter.

applications.name: Probability Spinner
applications.description: Spin a wheel with different sections to learn probability.

applications.name: Times Table Practice
applications.description: Quick multiplication quizzes for practice.

applications.name: Fractal Explorer
applications.description: Generate and zoom into fractals like the Mandelbrot set.

applications.name: Matrix Calculator
applications.description: Perform basic matrix operations interactively.

description: Explore living organisms, genetics, and ecosystems.

applications.name: Cell Explorer
applications.description: Click on cell organelles to learn their functions.

applications.name: DNA Base Pair Matching
applications.description: Drag and drop bases to form correct DNA pairs.

applications.name: Genetics Punnett Square
applications.description: Combine parent alleles to predict offspring genotypes.

applications.name: Food Chain Builder
applications.description: Create simple food chains by dragging plants and animals.

applications.name: Human Body Quiz
applications.description: Identify body parts on an interactive diagram.

applications.name: Plant Growth Stages
applications.description: Click through images showing stages from seed to mature plant.

applications.name: Animal Classification Sorter
applications.description: Drag animals into their correct classification groups.

description: Learn programming concepts and computational thinking.

applications.name: Sorting Algorithm Visualizer
applications.description: Step through bubble sort and see how sorting works.

applications.name: Binary Converter
applications.description: Convert decimal numbers to binary with step-by-step explanation.

applications.name: Logic Gate Simulator
applications.description: Build simple circuits with AND, OR, NOT gates and test inputs.

applications.name: Code Output Quiz
applications.description: Guess output of simple code snippets before revealing answers.

applications.name: Array Manipulator
applications.description: Add and remove items from arrays and visualize changes.

applications.name: Binary Tree Builder
applications.description: Insert and delete nodes from a binary tree and see structure update.

applications.name: Turing Machine Simulator
applications.description: Build and run simple Turing machines to see tape and states.
